attributes.action: Create a government rehabilitation programme for the homeless
attributes.additional_details:
We need a 3 stage rehabilitation programme in place. Stage 1 being taking on the vulnerable who need help, they are not allowed to leave until they are clean/fit for work. With help of volunteers they can learn new skills to have a plan an aim in life. 
Stage 2 would be being homed into a hostel with a round the clock support worker so they have a headstart to get back into work 
Stage 3 being homed into their own place once they are working.
attributes.background: Everyone is aware of the increasing rise in homelessness in the UK. Most homeless people become written off when they have alcoholism or use drugs. I’m calling for a change on that outlook. Mental health has made progress let’s not stop! Some people self harm to numb the pain, some turn to drink.
